title: Is it just me or is riot replying more often?

replies.body: It seems they make less serious posts now, before they just made formal ones.

Let me help you with that... 
The title says "Is it just me or is riot replying more often?"
I'm guessing the guys that write the patchnotes started teaching how to make jokes in OCE now.

yes they are.

and its going to continue.

just for oce i guess

i go on na, and there is not many reds

When the staff choose to get into real friendships with the community they create, it's proof they were hired for the right reasons.

Unless the guys at Rito give their employees work shifts where they go to reddit and follow a guideline for making standardized casual comments, while looking at photos of kittens eating cheeseburgers to increase their happiness efficiency.
You may also have noticed that they swear now .. Fuck fuckity fuck fuck fuck..
Perhaps it's the result of a decision by the community manager/PR strategists. I like it x10
